name: hack_me 3 Demo
detailed_description:
From the creator of hack_me and dev_me, a continuation of the acclaimed hacker simulator in 2016 and 2017 - hack_me 3 is already on Steam!


hack_me 3 - this is a game about an ordinary guy who is not ready to put up with new laws in his country, restricting freedom and anonymity in the network. You have to deal with this regime to prevent Orwell’s repetition of the novel '1984'. You will have a new messenger for communicating with new acquaintances and 'colleagues', a player for listening to your favorite music, working with the new terminal, and many other software and utilities. .

FEATURES

  • Changing the size and position of the program (for oldies who played in 1st part)
  • Nonlinear storyline with choices of answers in the dialogs
  • Pleasant graphics in pixel art
  • Dozens of commands and programs to fulfill your goals.
